ISSUE.TITLE: Add a setting indicating whether customers are required to re-login after password changing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently there's no way to disable this functionality in \Libraries\Nop.Services\Authentication\CookieAuthenticationService.cs file. Let's add a setting indicating whether customers are required to re-login after password changing. It can improve website performance when disabled (passwords are loaded for each HTTP request. )
